item.title: Pbrt render exporter update
item.description: I have spent some time the last 4 days, wrapping my head around what the next step should be. Iâ€™ve been wanting for a long time to move it from python to c++, but I did not know how. So I decided this weekend to spend time figuring that out. The result now is that I have PBRT API available inside a python module, this again means that I can go to the next step deeper and better integration of PBRT in blender, without implementing it directly in the blender source.
